EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.5-6-2016
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivots Are What Set Pivotal Apart, New Sessions At SpringOne Platform, and Pivotal Turns Three
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
May 6, 2016 <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal/features/pivots-are-what-set-pivotal-apart]]> Pivots are What Set Pivotal Apart CEO Rob Mee highlights a few of Pivotal’s notable achievements, including a new Series C investment round which will inject $253 million in new cash led by Ford with Microsoft, GE, EMC and VMware. He also takes time to thank the Pivots, investors, partners and customers who have helped pave the way forward on this tremendous journey of ushering the Silicon Valley smarts to the broader marketplace. Read The Post <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal/features/pivots-are-what-set-pivotal-apart]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/sessions]]> New Sessions At SpringOne Platform We just announced new sessions for SpringOne Platform. Join experts from Google, Netflix, and Pivotal as they discuss Java, Spring, OAuth2, and more. SpringOne Platform brings together the people, process, and tools for delivering and operating software services. Register now and we'll see you August 1–4 in Las Vegas! See Sessions <[[https://springoneplatform.io/sessions]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f-H1aJJpm0U]]> Pivotal Turns Three To celebrate our third birthday, we have made an animated GIF (above) to share news about our top three industries and provide a financial update on Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Pivotal Big Data Suite. Separately, we have also produced a one-minute video explaining our mission. Watch the Video Upcoming Events 5/11 Publish, Secure, and Monitor APIs with Pivotal Cloud Foundry Route Services, Webinar
5/12 Pivotal Cloud Foundry 101, London
5/12 Cloud Foundry PaaS Meetup, Cincinnati
5/13 Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow, Philadelphia
5/17 Pair Exchange, Los Angeles
